dcterms:description: A dataset used for causal representation learning that includes images of 7 object classes rendered from 10 causal variables, including object color and positions.
dcterms:title: Causal3DIdent

dcterms:creator: Julius von Kügelgen
Yash Sharma
Luigi Gresele
Wieland Brendel
Bernhard Schölkopf
Michel Besserve
Francesco Locatello
dcterms:description: A partially observable version of Causal3DIdent where some of the latent variables are masked to a predefined value.
dcterms:title: PartialCausal3DIdent

dcterms:description: A dataset created by rendering images of moving balls in a 2D space, where the latent causal variables are the positions of the balls.
dcterms:title: Multiple Balls

dcterms:description: A collection of simulated datasets used for experiments in causal representation learning.
dcterms:title: Simulated Datasets
